defi_sdk_py.helper_membership_and_stake_pool package

Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.helper_membership_and_stake_pool.HelperMembershipAndStakePool[source]

Bases: object

HelperMembershipAndStakePool provides utility functions to assist with membership and stake pool operations.

get_nft_list(address: str) → NFTList[source]

Retrieves a list of NFT IDs owned by a given address.

Parameters:

address – The address to query for owned NFTs

Returns:

An NFTList object containing the count and list of NFT IDs

get_rank_info_list() → List[RankInfo][source]

Retrieves a list of rank information for membership.

Returns:

A list of RankInfo objects containing rank details

get_stake_info(nft_id: int) → StakeInfo[source]

Retrieves the stake information for a given NFT ID.

Parameters:

nft_id – The NFT ID to query for stake information

Returns:

A StakeInfo object containing the stake details

get_stake_pool_next_settle_timestamp(stake_pool: IStakePool) → int[source]

Retrieves the next settlement timestamp for a stake pool.

Parameters:

stake_pool – The stake pool contract interface

Returns:

The next settlement timestamp as an integer

class defi_sdk_py.helper_membership_and_stake_pool.NFTList(count: int, nft_list: List[int])[source]

Bases: object

Represents a list of NFTs owned by an address along with the count.

Parameters:

  • count – The total number of NFTs

  • nft_list – A list of NFT IDs
